ProductInfo.Features:
It features advanced H.264 digital video recording, a premium 500GB Seagate brand hard disk drive.
The SecurONE kit is a complete system for local as well as remote surveillance right out of the box.
It has a four top of the line weatherproof Sony CCD security cameras for outdoors use at any time.
The SecurONE comes with a Seagate 500GB hard disk drive which is good for weeks of stored video
In-house testing has confirmed that the SecurONE is easily compatible with 1TB and 2TB drives.
ProductInfo.Name: SecurONE Outdoors Edition - Complete Surveillance Kit (H264 DVR+4 Weatherproof IP Cameras+1 TB HDD) Security Tracer system New
